snippet.title: Katana Rama - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
In a digital security fortress. Your mission: to hack through their defenses and retrieve a stolen program as you escape. You play as a hacker program armed with a powerful yet mysterious sword that was held captive within the system. As you make your way out of the ever changing and expanding labyrinth, you'll face powerful foes that perhaps hold answers to you and your weapon's origin. Who knows what lies at the end of your journey...

Follow us on:
Twitter:       https://twitter.com/GhostMach
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Ghost-Machine-106820448705051

Check out our website:
ghost-machine.net
